title: 114_hr6168
content: Academic Success Centers and Education Networks for Dreamers (ASCEND) Act This bill directs the Department of Education to award grants to not-for-profit institutions of higher education to develop programs that support Dreamer students in successfully completing postsecondary education. A quot, Dreamer studentquot. Is an individual who is a beneficiary of, or eligible for, the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals program.
